text.data-name: There was a possibility, that some records were missing and can’t be retrieved. But the approval workflow needed to keep a status of those missing records and show them as acceptable or not-acceptable.
text.tspan: There was a possibility, that some records were missing and
can’t be retrieved. But the approval workflow needed to keep
a status of those missing records and show them as

text.data-name: Users found looking up the documents in content server difficult and there was a bit of learning curve.
text.tspan: Users found looking up the documents in content server
difficult and there was a bit of learning curve.

text.data-name: Depending upon the user’s designation we got different feedbacks. People higher up in the hierarchy were fine with the OpenText Viewer, but those who were regular users did confirm to usability issues.
text.tspan: Depending upon the user’s designation we got different
feedbacks. People higher up in the hierarchy were fine with
the OpenText Viewer, but those who were regular users did

text.data-name: Working with enterprise tools with high learning curve, people really liked the LRMS solution and found it easier and pleasant to use.
text.tspan: Working with enterprise tools with high learning curve,
people really liked the LRMS solution and found it easier and
